text: Yerevan City Council elections were held on May 14, 2017. The Republican Party of Armenia won 71.25% of the total vote, Way Out Alliance had 21%, while Yerkir Tsirani won 7.75%. After the elections Yerevan City Council elected Taron Margaryan as Mayor of Yerevan.Taron Margaryan to remain Yerevan Mayor, 15 May 2017 == Parties == Three parties were registered each with its candidate for Mayor:Yerevan Council of Eldermen Elections Central Electoral Commission of Armenia * Republican Party of Armenia — Taron Margaryan * Way Out Alliance — Nikol Pashinyan * Yerkir Tsirani — Zaruhi Postanjyan == Results == == References == Yerevan City Council election 2017 Yerevan City Council Category:2017 elections in Europe Category:2017 elections in Asia Category:City council elections Category:May 2017 events in Europe Category:May 2017 events in Asia Category:21st century in Yerevan
title: 2017 Yerevan City Council election
